text: One person was killed and 10 injured in an accident involving a government bus and a lorry on Wednesday night. The bus from Hosur that was bound to Tirupur, was carrying over 30 passengers. While crossing Shoolagiri, the bus made a sudden stop for a passenger to alight. The lorry that was coming behind, rammed the bus at the rear. Kaathavarayan (35), an employee of Hosur bus depot, who was sleeping in the last seat of the bus was killed. Ten passengers were injured and admitted to Hosur GH. - Staff Reporter
title: One killed in accident
